resources.string: View Roles and Access of User

This user has the right to create classes,upload the assignments, tests and can also share the link to join video lectures. He can also review the assignment and tests and give the marks on the platform itself. This user will be kind of an administrator.
This user will have the right to perform the assignments, attend the tests and join the lectures. He will also be able to see the timetable and test results as mentioned above.
